entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is described as watching Snape and making a comment about the parchment. He is also referred to by name in the conversation.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as trying to get up, being bound by invisible ropes, and having a jinx operating on him. He is also referred to by name in the conversation.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is described as sniggering shrilly at Snape's situation.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is referred to by name in the conversation and is described as saying something to Snape.

relationships.description: Sirius teases Snape about his situation, making a comment about the parchment and calling him 'Snivelly'.
James scolds Snape by telling him to wash out his mouth with a spell.
